description: The prime minister of the Orb Union, and the father of Yuna. Thanks to his political skills and the high status of the Seiran family, Unato has little difficulty outmaneuvering his nation`s nominal leader, the idealistic but inexperienced Cagalli. As the new conflict begins, Unato uses his considerable influence to ensure that Orb aligns itself with the Earth Alliance.
name: Unato Ema Seiran
